meanings.definition: Not relating to or forming part of a skeleton.
meanings.sent1: The nonskeletal muscles help us move our arms and legs.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the nonskeletal tissues to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The nonskeletal organs in the body work together to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent4: Her nonskeletal strength was evident in her ability to lift heavy objects effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The nonskeletal structure of the building made it flexible and resistant to earthquakes.

meanings.sent1: The nonskeletal features of the painting gave it a lifelike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The artist focused on capturing the nonskeletal details of the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The nonskeletal design of the car made it stand out on the road.
meanings.sent4: His nonskeletal approach to problem-solving was innovative and effective.
meanings.sent5: The nonskeletal beauty of the garden was truly captivating.
